## Description {#details}

Builder for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debuglocstream">DebugLocStream</a> lists.

Definition at line 154 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-h">DebugLocStream.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Destructor

### ~ListBuilder() {#a479feee02fa95d0c98e3dd30ebd86111}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="DebugLocStream::ListBuilder::~ListBuilder ()">
Finalize the list.

If the list is empty, delete it. Otherwise, finalize it by creating a temp symbol in <em>Asm</em> and setting up the <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgvariable">DbgVariable</a></em>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-h/#l00175">175</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-h">DebugLocStream.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-cpp/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-cpp">DebugLocStream.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
